info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Caldwell County through 300 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Lenoir, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Cedar Rock, Kings Creek, Globe, Collettsville, Patterson and Upton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
